title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Transport) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department transport) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Ferghal Blaney, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Ferghal Blaney, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Transport, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
James Lawless, Minister of State at the Department of Transport with effect from 
18 July 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

3 September, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [436] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
